item.description:
This will be just a mingle Holiday cheers an dance night, its a small quant lounge and restaurant but they do not do reservations so I will be there just for the band which is excellant, it small but cozy.

Going with another group as well, its gets noisy so if that bothers you it would not be recommended, the age is diversified. No cover , no dress code. My GF CZ has it posted with other groups :-).

Band : Lee Hawkins Band

Time :9-1am

 

I thought I would throw this out there , if you want dinner gotta get there early. Parking in the back and across the street in the Church parking lot.
item.name: Dancing at Palmers to Lee Hawkins Band
